scripts.setup: npm install && cd ../scripts && npm install && cd ../app && npm run submodule-setup
scripts.submodule-setup: git submodule update --init --recursive --remote && cd ../i18n && git checkout main
scripts.build:dev01: npm run i18n-build && vue-cli-service build --mode dev01 && node ../scripts/updateASP.mjs dev01
scripts.build:dev02: npm run i18n-build && vue-cli-service build --mode dev02 && node ../scripts/updateASP.mjs dev02
scripts.build:dev03: npm run i18n-build && vue-cli-service build --mode dev03 && node ../scripts/updateASP.mjs dev03
scripts.build:stage01: npm run i18n-build && vue-cli-service build --mode stage01 && node ../scripts/updateASP.mjs stage01
scripts.build:stage02: npm run i18n-build && vue-cli-service build --mode stage02 && node ../scripts/updateASP.mjs stage02
scripts.build:prod01: npm run i18n-build && vue-cli-service build --mode prod01 && node ../scripts/updateASP.mjs prod01
scripts.build:prod02: npm run i18n-build && vue-cli-service build --mode prod02 && node ../scripts/updateASP.mjs prod02
scripts.deploy:dev01: npm run build:dev01 && npm run wrangler:dev01
scripts.deploy:dev02: npm run build:dev02 && npm run wrangler:dev02
scripts.deploy:dev03: npm run build:dev03 && npm run wrangler:dev03
scripts.deploy:prod: node ../scripts/envSwitcher.mjs && npm run deploy:prod01 || npm run deploy:prod02
scripts.deploy:prod01: node ../scripts/deployInquirer1.mjs && npm run build:prod01 && npm run wrangler:prod01 && node ../scripts/deployInquirer2.mjs
scripts.deploy:prod02: node ../scripts/deployInquirer1.mjs && npm run build:prod02 && npm run wrangler:prod02 && node ../scripts/deployInquirer2.mjs
scripts.deploy:stage01: npm run build:stage01 && npm run wrangler:stage01
scripts.deploy:stage02: npm run build:stage02 && npm run wrangler:stage02
scripts.watch: node ../scripts/updateASP.mjs local && npm run i18n-build && vue-cli-service build --watch --mode development
